    • Uses of RegistryChangeListener in org.eclipse.smarthome.core.items

      Subinterfaces of RegistryChangeListener in org.eclipse.smarthome.core.items 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  ItemRegistryChangeListener
      This is a listener interface which should be implemented where ever the item registry is used in order to be notified of any dynamic changes in the provided items.

    • Uses of RegistryChangeListener in org.eclipse.smarthome.core.thing

      Subinterfaces of RegistryChangeListener in org.eclipse.smarthome.core.thing 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  ThingRegistryChangeListener
      ThingRegistryChangeListener can be implemented to listen for things beeing added or removed.

    • Uses of RegistryChangeListener in org.eclipse.smarthome.model.rule.jvmmodel

      Classes in org.eclipse.smarthome.model.rule.jvmmodel that implement RegistryChangeListener 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  RulesItemRefresher
      The RulesItemRefresher is responsible for reloading rules resources every time an item is added or removed.
      class  RulesThingRefresher
      The RulesThingRefresher is responsible for reloading rules resources every time a thing is added or removed.

    • Uses of RegistryChangeListener in org.eclipse.smarthome.model.script.jvmmodel

      Classes in org.eclipse.smarthome.model.script.jvmmodel that implement RegistryChangeListener 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ScriptItemRefresher
      The ScriptItemRefresher is responsible for reloading script resources every time an item is added or removed.
